BR_text.BRdescription:
Hi, after I pass make check_install, I got below import error when I tried to train models. After apt-get install libsndfile1-dev, this error gone. Maybe need to fix this problem in related install scripts. Thx.
 <denchmark-code>>>> import librosa
 Traceback (most recent call last):
   File "<stdin>", line 1, in <module>
   File "/home/Project/espnet/tools/venv/lib/python3.7/site-packages/librosa/__init__.py", line 12, in <module>
     from . import core
   File "/home/Project/espnet/tools/venv/lib/python3.7/site-packages/librosa/core/__init__.py", line 124, in <module>
     from .audio import *  # pylint: disable=wildcard-import
   File "/home/Project/espnet/tools/venv/lib/python3.7/site-packages/librosa/core/audio.py", line 10, in <module>
     import soundfile as sf
   File "/home/Project/espnet/tools/venv/lib/python3.7/site-packages/soundfile.py", line 142, in <module>
     raise OSError('sndfile library not found')
 OSError: sndfile library not found
 </denchmark-code>

comments_0.comment_text:
Thank you for your report.
 We will add the library as a pre-requirement in README.
